```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r pkgs}
library(tidyverse)
library(drake)
library(fs)
library(here)
```

```{r combine-data}
park_status <- dir_map(here::here("data/"), 
                          fun = read_csv,
                          type = "file") %>% 
  bind_rows()
```


## Analysis

```{r print-data}
park_status
```

```{r prop-open}
prop_open <- park_status %>%
    pull(access) %>%
    str_to_lower() %>%
    str_detect("open") %>%
    mean()
```

Approximately `r prop_open` of parks in the nortern territory are open.
